UIの変更について、PTBでユーザーから散々な言われようだったのにも関わらず強行するとは思わなかった。
今までのUIに比べると情報が散乱し、キラー視点ではかなり悲惨な仕様になっています。

負傷状態、耐久ゲージ、残り発電機台数、能力ゲージ…驚くことなかれ、前までは左下を見るだけで確認できたのです。
今ではなんですか？上？左上？左？左下？

管理が難しいので、いつの間にか這いずりから回復してたり発電機残り台数の数字が見辛かったりと散々な出来。
せめてUXが最悪であってもUIが秀逸なら我慢できたが、如何せんダサイ（顔写真ダサいし、負傷状態のデザインもダサイ）

直近の評価を鑑みて、運営がユーザの意見を汲んでくれることを願う。
そうでなければ、DBDは第二のデスガーデンになるだろう。
まあしばらくはキラー触らないと思うので、サバイバーのみんなはキャンプファイア楽しんでくれ。
Все круто, но иногда хочется повесится

bug

В прошлом своём отзыве я изошлась говном, потому что очень уж мерзкую обнову выпустили разрабы. Но с тех пор мы увидели много новых патчей, а у меня наигралось ещё 600 часов, так что, думаю, было бы несправедливо гнать на игру, в которую я исправно играю каждый день. 
Главная прелесть ДБД -- возможность быстро разобраться в основных механиках игры. Да, игрока на 20 ранге можно моментально отличить от игрока, скажем, на 10. Тем не менее, здесь довольно быстро становится понятно, какие аспекты своей игры нужно совершенствовать. При этом, помнится, первые часы игры у меня неизбежно холодели руки, как только в лобби истекал таймер и раздавался стук сердца. Наиграв почти 800 часов, мне уже, конечно, сложно испытать настоящий страх или волнение, зато можно получить эмоции от новых карт: в Полицейском участке, который починили совсем недавно, я, как в первые свои дни в ДБД, чувствую полную расстерянность, восторг и панику :) В общем, спасибо разрабам за регулярное обновление контента. Ничего принципиально нового не добавляется -- это всё скорее из разряда "мелочь, а приятно" -- но этих мелочей достаточно, чтобы разжечь угасающий было энтузиазм. 

Если открыть сообщество, то там сплошь жалобы и возмущение, но на самом деле ДБД гораздо менее токсичная и более играбельная, чем пытается показаться.  

Правда, играбельность соло за выжившего -- вопрос сомнительный. Первые 100 часов я играла исключительно одна и меня всё устраивало, но после миллиарда совместных игр с друзьями после матчей соло хочется кому-нибудь что-нибудь разбить.

The new update is a hot mess. I can't believe that the devs thought such changes will be beneficial in any way. Hitboxes are worse than before, the survivors are running as if they're from Friday the 13th game, and all the information is scatter across the screen as if this game should be mobile or some shit. I don't know WHY they even thought to change the UI when the users had no problems whatsoever and no one was complaining. I know the devs said "the timeline is too tight" to modify things from PTB but you could've just not released the changes if it received bad reviews. Like WTF. I'm usually on the dev's side and have always thought people complained too much, but now I understand why people complain. Seriously, what the fuck is this??? Please get a grip.

- Update (3/4/21)

Look at the number of hours I have in this game. Hopefully that will assure you that my thoughts on this new update are coming from a place of experience and not just jumping on a hate train. The new UI is so, so bad. The new survivor animations are pretty bad and new survivor camera angles are legitimately disorientating in some situations. 

If you don't know what I'm talking about please look up what they've done so you know what you're getting yourself into.

The core game-play is good but it is obstructed by so many layers of flaws now I can't recommend this game to ANYONE anymore. 

If they revert this update or fix these issues then this review is invalid but until then do not buy this game.

EDIT: Took them a month but they fixed these issues, new UI elements are still bad but at-least they aren't all over the place. Hard for me to commit to a game where the devs can reduce its quality so hard so suddenly. I haven't gone back to this game since.

It's a good and unique game with a dev team so bad they make Bethesda look competent. 

The devs have just pushed through an update which was for about a month in a public test build. Issues with the update? There was overwhelmingly negative feedback about UI changes ever since they were first shown in the PTB, and now the UI was shipped with zero futher changes. Both of the updated maps have a multitude of bugs to them on a scale of walls you can walk through and invisible hitboxes. People are losing rank points after private custom games. And this is basically just the usual for this game. There were nearly no changes between PTB and full release. Watching any developer stream/commentary makes for an excellent practical course in most common coping mechanisms, since coping is the answer they give to just about any comment about their game of any nature, at this point including the positive ones.

The game is unique, includes many great characters from a multitude of other games and films, it has a dedicated and patient community with many notable personalities... and all of it is being poured down the drain by Behaviour with their "Mother knows best" approach. I wish I could give this game a positive review.

I absolutely love this game. The design of (most) killers, gameplay, chase interaction and being able to play with friends or by myself.

I have invested 4 years of game time into DBD. Currently sitting at just over 4K hours total. I've played through all eras of the game and all the ups/downs bugs/problems the game has had. Pre this latest patch the game was sitting at its best point in terms of playability. It absolutely had a myriad of problems but they weren't game breaking and my love for the game helped me to see past them.

However, this latest update is an absolute spit in the face to anyone who has invested any serious amount of time into the game at all. The developers changed multiple things that nobody asked for, received the feedback that nobody liked it and implemented the changes anyway. I have been playing online games for years and BEhaviour are by FAR the worst developers at both time management, choosing what to focus their resources on and ESPECIALLY player feedback. They do not listen.

Even besides the changes nobody asked for and how poorly they were implemented this newest update has also not only has more incredibly unfun breakable walls added and a shitty UI but a myriad of literal game breaking bugs. Walls with no collision, areas of the map (auto haven bus) where the killer CANNOT pass through but the survivor can- which was completely fine last patch AND on the PTB (test servers).

The developers stumbled upon a cash cow and just release skin after skin, DLC after DLC, battlepass after battlepass with no care for the people who helped build their game. They balance the game to the casuals and do not care about their core playerbase as they constantly have new players coming in dropping money on DLC's/cosmetics. I do not want to target anyone specifically but they mention in livestreams that they "use the wiki" to know what certain perks do- they do not even know their own game. The lead game designer who I won't name is an absolute moron, his views on the game are INCREDIBLY bad and having someone like that helm the ship is HORRIBLY unhealthy for a good player experience.

For 4 years time players have been asking for a colorblind mode in order to be able to play the game as some people were unable to see scratch marks due to their condition. For 4 years we were told "its not on our priority list". Only when the community REALLY made a big fuss about it did they release that they were "happy to announce we are working on colorblind filters". They do not care about the player, only their image.
When the last absymal twins update game out riddled with bugs they were very quick to change Moris- something players have been asking to be changed for years, an incredibly easy fix. The only reason it was changed then was to take the spotlight away from how disgusting and unprofessional their released DLC was. I cannot state enough how little they care about their playerbase.

I absolutely love Dead By Daylight. But in its current state and with the way the developers handle their game I cannot recommend this game to anyone. Do not buy this product. This is now the second major update in a row that has come RIDDLED with bugs/problems. Please do not support this game.
